title: Do you like the kids new 2017 music? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is an abomination of satanic culture and of course the demeaning of women(bitches)as they refer to us.All of them cover one eye as it is a Lucifarian signal that their souls are no longer their own.They dye their hair blonde or don blonde wigs to let others know their programming was a success.lf you don't believe me,listen to interviews they give and it will scare you.Their music award shows are all about worshipping Satan.They have public breakdowns and realists as they are trying to fight the NO Ultra programming and l know all recall Brittney Spears shaving her head and attacking a vehicle.lt is so sad and l encourage all to stay away from it and them as they are not themselves anymore.They nothing of a human spirit left as that was the price they paid for fame.Not worth it as they all done.
